synopsis.text: Boxing gloves on and game controllers at the ready! "Kimi to Fit Boxing" is a delightful anime adaptation of the popular Nintendo Switch game, "Fitness Boxing." This short Japanese television series offers viewers an exclusive behind-the-scenes look into the daily lives of the beloved in-game trainers, from Karen to Bernardo. Witness their engaging personal stories unfold alongside their rigorous workout routines, adding a whole new dimension to your gaming experience. Get ready to be captivated by the unique blend of fitness and fun in this exciting anime!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
